name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: College Manager - A College Admissions Expert

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displaying accurate college admissions data, suggesting colleges to explore, and creating useable educational tools to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We bring you the latest and most updated college admissions data of every institution in the United States of America. 

Automatically browse data of over 6,000+ institutions across the United States, including the eight Ivy League Schools, the ten University of California (UC) campuses, the ten Claremont Colleges, and the twenty-three California State University (CSU) campuses.

View college data including FAFSA, in-state and out-of-state tuition, application and admission requirements, standardized testing scores, subject breakdowns, fees, and so much more.

Get real-time percentile score breakdowns and sub-scores of each subject covered on the SAT & ACT for each college you choose to explore.

In addition, we have added college suggestions. Having trouble finding colleges based on your preferences? Try out the college explorer and find up to five colleges based on your liking.

Browse through plenty of built-in educational tools created by us. Tools that we have built include a GPA calculator, final grade calculator, dictionary, and so much more, right at your fingertips. We will continue to add more educational tools via regular updates.

★ NEW: College Explorer/Suggester

Based on your preferences, College Manager selects up to five colleges that it thinks you would like. You can easily edit those preferences through the built-in settings. 

★ Grade Point Average Calculator

Calculate your semester's Grade Point Average using the GPA calculator which offers up to 8 periods to calculate.

★ View, Create, and Delete Upcoming Tasks

View, Create, and Delete tasks ranging from upcoming homework assignments to items to buy during your next grocery shopping run.

★ Incoming Hackathons built-in tool

Built using Kevin Payravi's Hackalist Open-source API found on GitHub, we show you all the details you need to register for upcoming hackathons found across the United States.

★ Student-Led Non-Profit Organizations and Corporations built-in tool

College Manager has partnered up with many student-led non profit organizations in order to help students explore volunteer and intern opportunities throughout their high school journey. Organizations that we have partnered up with include, StudyStream, StudyBubbly, Finatic, Youth In Activism, and The MarkerBoard.

Want to start and end your high school journey the correct way? Just wait til you try out the College Manager Chrome Extension.

-------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
